name: Iron Sword
description: A basic weapon forged from iron, the iron sword is sturdy and reliable. Its blade, though plain, holds a keen edge, suitable for cutting through soft materials and parrying weaker attacks.

name: Iron dagger
description: A basic weapon forged from iron, the iron dagger is sturdy and reliable. Its blade, though plain, holds a keen edge, suitable for cutting through soft materials and parrying weaker attacks.
